item.title: Quaoar Virtual Machine - Walkthrough
item.description: “Quaoar” is a “Boot2Root” VM originally created for the Hackfest 2016 CTF. It aims to train your computer security skills. You just have to launch the Virtual Machine, and then find a way to get root ! This VM is in free access on Vulnhub.
